name: places/ChIJu6kY43RawokRnmczCmSH-_s
formattedAddress: 455 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 455 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Plush rooms & palatial suites in an upscale lodging with a cozy bar, a French bakery & a spa.

originalText.text:
During my recent visit to New York, I had the exquisite pleasure of attending a magic show at the renowned New York Palace Hotel. This visit not only introduced me to the mesmerizing talents of a world-class magician but also allowed me to experience the elegance and sophistication of one of New York's most prestigious hotels.

From the moment I stepped into the lobby, the New York Palace Hotel exuded an air of luxury and refinement that is hard to find elsewhere. Its interior, a perfect blend of modern sophistication and timeless elegance, set a high standard for what was to become an unforgettable evening. The attention to detail in the decor and the impeccable service from the hotel staff added layers of enjoyment to my visit.

The magic show took place in an old French-style salon within the hotel, which could not have been a more perfect setting. The salon's antique charm and beautiful aesthetics provided a magical backdrop that enhanced the overall experience of the show. It felt as though we were transported to another era, one where elegance and wonder intertwine.

What stood out to me, apart from the hotel's stunning architecture and design, was the class with which everything was handled. From the welcoming staff to the luxurious accommodations, every aspect of the New York Palace Hotel was designed to offer guests an unparalleled experience of comfort and grandeur.

Attending a magic show at the New York Palace Hotel was not just an evening out; it was an immersion into a world where elegance and enchantment reign supreme. This hotel, with its sophisticated ambiance and world-class service, has set a new benchmark for what I consider luxury. It's not just a place to stay; it's a destination that offers a glimpse into the opulent lifestyle of New York's elite.

In conclusion, my experience at the New York Palace Hotel was nothing short of spectacular. For those looking to indulge in the finer aspects of New York City, be it through its entertainment or its accommodations, the Palace Hotel is a testament to what true luxury feels like. It was the perfect venue for a magical evening, and I look forward to returning for more unforgettable experiences.

---

originalText.text: This historic hotel lives up to its reputation. We have stayed here several times throughout the years and have visited many more times for the bar or just to enjoy the ambiance. The rooms are fantastic with some incredible views. The staff is always pleasant and helpful. We also greatly enjoy the upstairs and downstairs bars (can't think of the names at the moment) for both food and drinks. The hotel is perfectly located in the heart of midtown, walking distance from the park, Rockefeller center, and of course the shopping. I love the decor they put up each year for Christmas time!

originalText.text:
I had a great stay at this hotel for my business trip.
The room was spacious, opulent and comfy.
Waking up each morning to a beautiful sunset and the gorgeous skyline was an amazing experience!
Highly recommended for its accessibility to all things in Midtown Manhattan

originalText.text:
The Hotel Lotte New York Palace offers an exceptional experience that combines a prime location, a welcoming ambiance, and high-quality customer service.

The hotel's location in an iconic area of the city positions it as an ideal landmark for exploring New York. Its proximity to key landmarks and tourist attractions adds value for guests seeking to immerse themselves in the vibrant city life.

The welcoming ambiance of the Hotel Lotte New York Palace creates a comforting environment for guests. Attention to detail in the decoration and interior design contributes to a warm and inviting atmosphere, providing a pleasant and relaxing accommodation experience.

Customer service is one of the hotel's strong suits. The staff shows remarkable dedication to meeting guests' needs, offering attentive and professional service at all times.

During the holiday season, the Hotel Lotte New York Palace transforms with impressive decorations that capture the festive essence. Elaborate decorations, from the towering tree to the festive ornaments, immerse guests in a charming and festive Christmas ambiance.

The combination of an excellent location, a welcoming atmosphere, exceptional service, and spectacular Christmas decorations makes the Hotel Lotte New York Palace one of the standout destinations to experience the festive season in the Big Apple.

In summary, the Hotel Lotte New York Palace provides a noteworthy accommodation experience highlighted by its strategic location, welcoming ambiance, and exceptional festive atmosphere during the holiday season

originalText.text: I went to the Lotte Palace today and was extremely disappointed with the service. The establishment itself is beautiful but please do not be fooled, there are some staff that are quite rude. I wanted to receive help in booking a venue for a birthday event I’m throwing in the near future, when I arrived I was not greeted by anyone, frankly ignored: no one wanted to bother with me even though I did schedule an appointment to come in today beforehand so I was confused by the treatment. When an employee finally approached me, JAMES and usher/or guard, his demeanor was aggressive and just plain mean. I asked him for help in finding the main lobby, since I did not know where it was, and he refused to assist me. Not only this but he also obnoxiously told another coworker to not assist me either when I went and asked someone else after his refusal. I tried to talk to a manager about him but they did not really seem to care. I was not an official guest staying there maybe thats why I was treated this way but everyone deserves to be treated with respect. I was so upset I wanted to forget the venue booking altogether and leave. It would have been great if the service was not so lacking…
